author: Michael Lloyd
comment: I've always loved evolve sms but I just got a new XZ premium and it has improved on this phone.. I know you have to pay for themeing but it's worth it!! Looks fantastic, feels great.. And if you're too tight to pay the nice developers for there hard work, then you lose out!!! You get what you pay for.. No adverts or anything that pesters you to spend more money.. I love it!! Thank you 😁👍

author: Carlos Silva
comment: When it works it's great, but when it doesn't, well why have it if it doesn't work, right. Not sure why it just stops receiving texts, sometimes it's because I forget to turn off VPN, stock app works with VPN. But other times it just doesn't work.  Was using it on One Plus 5 stock Hydrogen. Latest is Hydrogen updated to Oreo. Seems to be OK so far with most things, but not changing rating because can't set ringtones. Can select them, but they don't take, at all. Back to stock messaging app for now.

author: Scott Vigil
comment: Just about perfect. I love the dark theming.  The live preview widgit is awesome. General UI layout it the best ever. I love swiping between conversations and having the list on the left in portait mode. Powerful tools  I wish this would be able to integrate Facebook messenger where it combines SMS and fb conversations in line like Windows phone 7 used to. That was powerful but fb broke it.  Small UI suggestions: Use parallaxing on elements to give a subtle 3d look. Squish bounce the screen when you scroll to the bottom.  Small usability issues: Sometimes it splits my conversations into two conversations with the same contact. Sometimes it loads photos a little clunky, lag where it has to reload. Textra feels a bit snappier the evolve  By far the cleanest, best overall app on the market! Well worth the money.

author: Eric Watson
comment: On the Moto X4, MMS messages repeatedly get sent to the wrong person, and sending messages disables wifi until I go into Android's settings and turn it back on.   Worked great on my old phone though...

author: EW Ranch
comment: Thank you soon much! I have been having problems with text messages coming in split and out of order. I tried every SMS app imaginable trying to fix . Reset my phone, tried SMS timestamp fix apps. You name it and I tried it! This is the only thing that worked! Forever grateful! You can manually put your carrier info in advance settings. Thanks!

author: Daniel S
comment: Dec 26 2017 update...  large images send at 161kb?.. just wish the Android Wear Reply would work correctly.. ( only responds to last message conversation.. it just acts like it sends for previous messages )

author: H.L. Calderwood
comment: This is an update--12/30/17, trying iyt out again, so far so good. I was using Klinkers other app for messaging,, but something changed with an update and havent been able to use it in a long time So, back to Evolve, we'll see.  Edit:  9/25/15--Reinstalled after uninstalling awhile back, I tried another app, but I decided to use Evolve again. Unfortunately when I paid for the Talon Twitter Theme a few months ago, it didn't save, so there is no record of it.

author: Bj Maldonado
comment: So I just downloaded this after 3 years of being in iOS. I like its look and feel but when scrolling up all the messages are just blank for a bit before they show up. I can't handle the delay :(

author: Chris Neal
comment: This would be 5 stars, but it cannot handle getting a contact card as an attachment. Shows up as blank.
Seems to work fine.  Not as pretty as Textra but has functions Textra doesn't have.  I may buy one of Evolve's packs to see if that helps. Overall not a bad app.

author: Bernadette Queener
comment: I tried to change this trip my messaging app but it's difficult to me. Everything customizable is an extra cost. It's taking a really long time to sync contact information. I can't get back to the actual conversations without getting looped into the settings section. I'm going back to my old app

author: Jesse
comment: It crashes from time to time and has a hard time rendering messages at times.  Doesn't work correctly with adding stuff from Google keyboard like gifs as instead of inserting into the current message it makes a new one that you have to put the contacts in for.  I'm not a huge fan of how it displays certain aspects like media in messages while composing.  The draft prompts are nice but can be intrusive during use.  Overall it's pretty good but it's rough around the edges.  If these were addressed and cleaned up along with some other stuff like stability it would be great for sure.

author: Tom Coleman
comment: I slightly criticized that you have to pay for theming and was met with a rude response. No I don't expect you to work for free, that's why I pay for apps (over $166 spent on apps actually, your theme add- on among them). Your app is no where near good enough to merit the arrogant attitude  you have. The app itself is laggy and chances are won't ever change if sliding messaging is any indication. Just google search "Klinker brothers" and the first link will take you to a thread filled with people who experienced similar disrespect at the slightest criticism.  QKSMS, Google Messenger, Textra, Chomp > Evolvesms

reply.author: Luke Klinker
reply.content: Sorry, we can't all work for free.

author: Joel Gwartney
comment: I love a lot of things about this texting but the biggest drawback for me is the "Conversations" page. I wish it would cover the whole screen, not just a little more than 3/4 of the screen.  I will say, they have the best delayed texting. When you send the message it basically outboxes it into the message field and you can start another text. So if for example your delay time is 30 seconds, you could hit send and it will outbox them for 30 seconds individually (obviously you can cancel them) then send them. Pretty much every other messaging app that has the delay doesn't offer that. When you hit send they force you to wait until it sends before you can begin typing another text, which can be kind of annoying if you are responding to several different text or different topics within a text and breaking it up.  Trying to find one that has a better "conversations" page. This will do for now.

author: Fred Iccini
comment: app is crashing every time I try to select users when using the contacts icons. I'll change the rating once this issue is fixed. also, a minor issue is that occasionally, it "forgets" I have set someone's sound and instead uses the default sound...repeatedly.

author: Mike Hall
comment: I installed this month's ago... Buggy mms issues ... I bought the feature pack add-ons but it just wouldn't work right so I un-installed... Reinstalled just now to see if any improvements have been made ... It wants me to buy the feature pack again... What a Rip off...be careful... It has a bad habit of sending texts to the wrong people...

author: Sean Petrovic
comment: Finally fixed its issues. Best Messaging app!

author: MicaiCutie
comment: wish u dont have to be asked to buy everytime u click a SIMPLE customization. annoying.

author: Zack Fox
comment: Good app for sms and mms! I hated the sms app that came on my LG and after a good month of searching and trying other apps, this one has made me very happy

It's not a bad a sms app. It could definitely stand to have pulse integration (as a paid user of both). UPDATE: Pulse integration has been added, to an extent, which is an improvement.   The customization has been improved. I feel like there should be an option to completely disable that conversation tray, in favor of another method of switching between threads. It's getting there.

author: Israel Mbuthia
comment: I will be very candid, looks really great until you start using it, all over sudden its hanging, texts don't come through, you have to keep restarting the phone. Thanks but no thanks.
Could not get the notifications working despite trying everything suggested. Sending text to myself for testing brought up an error message in Evolve despite working okay in other messaging apps.

author: colt hunt
comment: App says it has tons of colors and themes to choose from.. Yeah if you want to buy the add on pack. I wouldn't be annoyed if it wasn't advertised as already includes 250+ color options

author: Ronnie Nicklaus
comment: Awesome. Almost there. Needs a few things pulled over from the pulse app.

author: Matthew Phillips
comment: Slow to start EVERY TIME. locks up. Tried all of the suggested help to no avail...

author: April Barnes
comment: The contact list is not convenient and I find it cumbersome to use.

author: Sha Ro
comment: Could not add more than 1 pic at a time, uses old way of sharing media

author: Brittni Burrell
comment: If this app showed up as messaging on the app instead of evolve sms  u would give 5 stars!

author: kimani Nimrod
comment: Could rate it higher, but I don't get notifications and messages through the app. Kindly, work something out.

author: ras dan
comment: Why have it yet it doesn't support delivery messages. How will i know that my txt has been delivered or not!!!

author: D. Morrison
comment: LOVE this app! Works great with Moto360 and gif text sharing. This is my go to texting app!

author: Christofer Roy
comment: No keyboard entry method available on wear?

author: eternallystrong
comment: Keeps crashing 😢

author: Craig M
comment: Ten times better than my stock messages application

author: Larry Driver
comment: It's the best messaging app I've used yet.
Exceptional. I just wish it had desktop abilities
U'all Rock! I'm enjoying your app, TY!

author: Cole Y Mitchell
comment: Great app. Keep up the great work.

author: Wendy Leader
comment: Great app best so far

author: Rafael Soria
comment: Awesomeness! Love this app.
